New Records: Shreyas Iyer scored 128* off 94 balls, the highest score by an Indian batsman in a World Cup match
Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer's unbeaten 128 helped India post 410/4, their highest total in the World Cup
KL Rahul scored 102 off 64 balls, his highest score in the World Cup
India won by 160 runs, their biggest margin of victory in the World Cup
Teja Nidamanuru scored 54 off 39 balls, the highest score by a Dutch batsman in the World Cup
India's Shreyas Iyer was awarded the Player of the Match
Post-Match Reflections: India's Shreyas Iyer expressed his delight at being awarded the Player of the Match
India's coach said that the team's batting depth was the key to their success
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
India elected to bat first and scored 410/4, their highest total in the World Cup
Netherlands were bowled out for 250, their lowest total in the World Cup
The match was played under lights, with the first session starting at 14.00 local time
Others: The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
The match was played on November 12, 2023
